text: Ani tya doghancya daramyana eka ada padada asela ani arapha (uncavatya) vara kahi manase asatila je pratyekala tyancya nisananvaruna olakhuna ghetila, ani jannati lokanna haka de'una sangatila ki tumacyavara salamati aso, te tya (jannata) madhye ajuna dakhala jhale nasatila ani tici asa balagata asatila
